page.title: 19PLACES OF WORSHIP
page.content: {A)Christian B)Others}A)Church of England 5 Non-Conformist 16 Roman Catholic 3 Sects:Jehovah's Witnesses 1 Morman 1 Spiritualist 1 B) Mosque 1 Synagogue 1. The Churches provide Chaplain Service to the hospitals and Polytechnic.Also Wearside Council of Churches employ two full time Chaplains,in Industry and in social Resposibility.{EASTER CELEBRATIONS It is traditional on Good Friday morning for Sunday School Scholars to march with banners through the town to the Civic Centre where they are met by the Mayor.The Salvation Army band leads community hymn singing.This is followed by Church services at which all children receive an orange.A.R.C. Church erects a large cross on Tunstall Hill.At 6.30 on Easter Sunday there is a service of celebration for all around the cross.
